attributes.action: Make wearing of masks in public outside the home compulsory with no exceptions.
attributes.additional_details: To stop the number of COVID related deaths and instances of people catching and spreading the virus and to relieve the pressure on hospitals and other front line staff
attributes.background: Pass the necessary emergency legislation to enable the mandatory requirement to wear a mask and stop vaping outside the home when there are other members of the public within sight.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917
